<<<<<<< HEAD
Here beginneth the second part of the fryer and the boy Many a merry jest herein is exprest. Fryer and the boy. Part 2.
[24] p. : ill.
printed by A.M. and R.R. for Edward Brewster a[t] the Crane in St. Paul's Church-yard, and are to be sold by James Gilbertson next door to the Sun and Bible on London-bridge, London : 1680.
With title page woodcut. Caption title on A3r reads: The second part of the Frier and the boy. In verse. Advertisement on verso of B4. Signatures: A B⁴; A1 is misbound, following B4. Imperfect; title page is cropped at head and side, affecting some print. Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge.
=======
